import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import Slider from 'react-slick'; import './Main.css'; import "slick-carousel/slick/slick.css"; import "slick-carousel/slick/slick-theme.css"; const Main = () => { const [showVideoModal, setShowVideoModal] = useState(false); const navigate = useNavigate(); const sliderSettings = { dots: false, infinite: true, speed: 500, slidesToShow: 5, slidesToScroll: 1, responsive: [ { breakpoint: 1024, settings: { slidesToShow: 3, } }, { breakpoint: 600, settings: { slidesToShow: 2, } } ] }; const heroSliderSettings = { dots: true, infinite: true, speed: 500, slidesToShow: 1, slidesToScroll: 1, autoplay: true, autoplaySpeed: 5000, }; const handleVideoPlay = () => { setShowVideoModal(true); }; const handleLogout = () => { localStorage.removeItem('userEmail'); navigate('/'); }; return (
